## Analysis

```{r print-data}
loadd(park_status)
```

```{r breaks}
unique(park_status$date)
```


```{r prop-open}
prop_open <- park_status %>%
    pull(access) %>%
    str_to_lower() %>%
    str_detect("open") %>%
    mean()
```

Approximately `r prop_open` of parks in the nortern territory are open.

```{r create-openness-table}
park_status %>% 
  mutate(is_open = detect_open(access)) %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  summarise(prop_open = mean(is_open)) %>% 
  knitr::kable()
```
